channel.title: Katie Holmes on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Katie Holmes on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Katie Holmes to Star in Adaptation of ‘Hedda Gabler’ at San Diego’s Old Globe Theatre
item.description: The casting reunites Holmes with the Globe’s artistic director, Barry Edelstein, who directed her in the Off-Broadway production of ‘The Wanderers’ in 2023.
